SA11sanss15u:5: iha gṛhapate gṛhī bodhisatvo dharmeṇa bhogān paryeṣate nâdharmeṇa /
SA11sanss15u:9: na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvêryāpatham āracayati /
SA11sanss15u:11: na śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ kramān utkṣipati na nikṣipati yugamātraprekṣikayā saviśva-
SA11sanss15u:16: na bodhisatvo lābhahetor lābhanidānaṃ mandabhāṇī mṛdubhāṇī na priyabhāṇī bhavati /
SA11sanss15u:19: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā câlpêcchatāṃ darśayati /
SA11sanss15u:21: antardāhâiṣa kulaputra yad vācâlpêcchatā cittena lābhakāmatā /
SA11sanss15u:22: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kuhanalapanalābhâpagato bhavati /
SA11sanss15u:24: na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti /
SA11sanss15u:28: na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate /
SA11sanss15u:31: yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvâivaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /
SA11sanss15u:34: kena vā me dānapatinâmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayâmukôpakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA11sanss15u:35: tena me śīlavān ayam iti kṛtvêdaṃ cêdaṃ ca dattaṃ bahuśrutêti /
SA11sanss15u:37: mayā ca tasya kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya parigṛhītaṃ /
SA11sanss15u:39: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca /
SA11sanss15u:45: iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati /
SA11sanss15u:48: ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vâdattā vânanujñātā vā /
SA11sanss15u:55: mātāpitṛmitrâmātyajñātisālohitebhyaḥ kālânukālam ātmanā paribhuṅkte paribhuñjānaś câraktaḥ paribhuṅkte /
SA11sanss15u:56: svanadhyavasito na câlabhyamāne lābhe khedacittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss15u:57: na paritapyati na ca dāyakadānapatīnām antike 'prasādacittam utpādayatîty ādi //
SA11sanss15u:58: tatrâiṣâpy asya bodhisatvasya bhogaśuddhir ātmabhāvaśuddhivat parahitāya bhavet //
SA11sanss15u:60: punar aparaṃ bhadanta śāriputra ye praviśantîdaṃ gṛhaṃ teṣāṃ samanantarapraviṣṭānāṃ sarvakleśā na bādhante 'yaṃ dvitīyâścaryâdbhuto dharmaḥ //
SA11sanss15u:62: atha tato bhojanāt sarvāvatī sā parṣat tṛptā bhūtā /
SA11sanss15u:64: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālais tad anyaiś ca satvais tad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ tā-
SA11sanss15u:69: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
SA11sanss15u:70: tad yathâpi nāma tasyām eva sarvagandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ //
SA11sanss15u:72: yaiś ca bhadantânanda bhikṣubhir anavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām evâvakrāntaniyamānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
SA11sanss15u:74: yair anutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
SA11sanss15u:75: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nâpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyatîti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss15u:85: yathā gaganaṃ samaviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti //
SA11sanss15u:87: yathā gaganam aparyantam evam aparyantīkṛtena cittena tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:88: yathā gaganaṃ vistīrṇam anāvaraṇam evaṃ bodhipariṇāmitaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:89: yathā gaganam arūpi evaṃ sarvarūpâniśritaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:92: evam asaṃjñi asaṃskṛtam avijñaptilakṣaṇam evam apratijñānaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:93: yathā gaganaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraspharaṇam evaṃ sarvasatvamaitrīspharaṇaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:95: yathā gaganaṃ sadāprakāśam evaṃ cittaprakṛtiviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dada-ti /
SA11sanss15u:96: yathā gaganaṃ sarvasatvâvakāśaṃ evaṃ sarvasatvôpajīvyaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss15u:97: yāvad yathā nirmito nirmitāya dadāti nirvikalpo 'nābhogaḥ /
SA11sanss15u:106: evaṃ tyāgacittaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvo gaganasamadāno bhavati //
SA11sanss15u:112: nâsti nikrandadānaṃ yāvan nâsti yācanakeṣûpataptadānaṃ nâsty uccagghana*ullāpanadānaṃ nâsti parāṅmukhadānaṃ nâsty apaviddhadānaṃ nâsty asvahastadānaṃ /
SA11sanss15u:115: nâsty akāladānaṃ nâsti viṣaśastradānaṃ nâsti satvaviheṭhanādānam iti //
SA11sanss15u:121: madyapānād api nairāśyakṛte bodhisatve pratigho garīyān /
SA11sanss15u:122: satvasaṃgrahahāniś câto 'nyaprasādanôpāyâsaṃbhave madyaṃ deyam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanss15u:123: śastrâdiṣv api yady anubadhagurulâdyavavicārād dānam āpadyeta /
SA11sanss15u:136: yāvad achedyâbhedyaṃ gaganam achedyâbhedyaṃ tacchīlam ity ādi //
SA11sanss15u:138: samaprayogaṃ gaganaṃ sarvasatvasamacittasya kṣāntipariśuddhir ity ādi //
SA11sanss15u:146: na kalpo na vikalpo na parikalpaḥ //
SA11sanss15u:147: yâivaṃ kṣāntir iyaṃ bodhisatvasya paramā gaganasamā kṣāntir /
SA11sanss15u:179: yāvad iyaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitā caryāpariśuddhir iti //
SA11sanss15u:183: saddharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca bodhisatvacaryâtyajanagocaraś câyam api bodhisatvasya gocara /
